mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER(user_id,user_pw,user_name, user_birth,user_postcode,user_address, user_address_detail,user_type,user_phone) VALUES(#{userId},#{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userBirth},#{userPostcode},#{userAddress}, #{userAddressDetail},#{userType},#{userPhone})
